1. [Mayor & Council](https://www.aledotx.gov/mayor-council)

Todd Covington
==============

Todd Covington has proudly called Aledo home for nearly 30 years. He is the owner of Covington Services, LLC, a company providing private security, technology and IT services across the DFW area. A licensed private security professional and FAA-certifiedÂ pilot with a drone endorsement, Todd brings a wealth of experience in both public safety and technology.

Throughout his time in Aledo, Todd has been deeply committed to serving the community. He enjoys giving back in meaningful ways and working alongside local schools, organizations and neighbors to make the city a better place.

Todd has also worked closely with multiple city governments, including Aledo, Willow Park and the Town of Annetta, providing IT and security services. This experience has given him a unique perspective on local government operations and a strong dedication to transparency and integrity in public service.
